import React ,{useState} from 'react'; import '../Posts.css'; import axios from "axios"; function Posts2() { const [post , setPost] = useState({ }); const [rule , setRule] = useState(0); const [likes , setLikes] = useState(0); const [costumer_id , setCostumer_id] = useState(1); const add_Posts = (e) => { // e.preventDefault(); axios.post(`http://localhost:8000/api/post` , { post , rule , likes , costumer_id} ); console.log(post); }; const fetchPost = async () => { try { const { data } = await axios.get(` https://api.themoviedb.org/3/${mediaType}/${id}?api_key=${process.env.REACT_APP_API_KEY}&page=1`); // eslint-disable-next-line setContent(data); setIsLoading(true); } catch (error) { if (error.response && error.response.status === 404) { history.replace("/error"); } } }; useEffect(() => { fetchPost(); window.scroll(0, 0); // eslint-disable-next-line }, []); return ( <>
